ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 12 Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: Its a bit more than buggy...  I blew off 60 bone chips one time trying for a blue pet (I was lvl 14 at the time).  I couldnt hit lvl 16 fast enough after I saw
ygData.messageBody:
Its a bit more than buggy... I blew off 60 bone chips one time trying for a
blue pet (I was lvl 14 at the time). I couldnt hit lvl 16 fast enough after I
saw how may chips I was blowing *Sigh*
If you dont have it allready, get Reclaim Energy. You will most definately need
it. Level 16 pet suppose to be buggy as well but I only pulled out 1 green pet
(Im 19 now) so far.

Zipporo
Cazic-Thule


From: GrodanBlod@...

I heard the 12th level pet spell was a bit buggy...I too summon my share of
green skellies...Time will tell...I suggest writting the folks at Everquest
to report a possible bug.

Lucas, Dark Elven Necromancer
Bristlebane
